name: Abstra
headline: Python-based BPM
description: Scale business processes with orchestrated scripts, integrations and UIs. Skip engineering hours, stay auditable & lock-in free.

founders.name: Bruno Vieira Costa, Founder
founders.description:
I'm Bruno, founder of Abstra. I'm a computer engineer and programmer since 7.

Previous Abstra, I co-founded an edtech called PaperX where I was CTO. I sold it during college to Descomplica (biggest edtech in Brazil) where I worked after as Product Manager and Tech Lead.
Also, I co-founded a Game Studio called Sinextra where I was Game Designer before college.

I love all kind of creative activities, from making music, comics, games or software.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/628307c2d00556f6126ace8f/6284628c50538b5b59a1fdd1_icons8-menu-arredondado-100.webp)
# Build Smarter, Deploy Faster
Turn complex processes into untangled solutions. Get all the power of Python + AI for optimized workflows‚Äîwithout the overhead.
[Explore Abstra's Solutions](https://abstra.io/<https:/meet.abstra.app/demo?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.abstra.io%2F&session=undefined>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com//webflow.com/c234defb-1a6a-4410-bc2a-d1f8ca56bdea)![light-green](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/628307c2d00556f6126ace8f/645bd2e08488edef71f99180_light-green.webp)![yellow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/628307c2d00556f6126ace8f/645bd2c992e742fa88388d27_yellow.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com//webflow.com/c234defb-1a6a-4410-bc2a-d1f8ca56bdea)![light-green](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/628307c2d00556f6126ace8f/645bd2e08488edef71f99180_light-green.webp)![yellow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/628307c2d00556f6126ace8f/645bd2c992e742fa88388d27_yellow.webp)
#### TRUSTED BY SMART TEAMS AT ENTERPRISES ACROSS INDUSTRIES
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/628307c2d00556f6126ace8f/63eab22a962529cdae603591_accenture.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/628307c2d00556f6126ace8f/63eab22f58fc7b44dbb89297_stone.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/628307c2d00556f6126ace8f/65c0e8b456d9f42d198203f9_clickbus_white.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/628307c2d00556f6126ace8f/664cf1b981cf3cdb4dba84f3_jusbrasil_white.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/628307c2d00556f6126ace8f/63eab22fad0d468dd57dc09c_educbank.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/628307c2d00556f6126ace8f/63eab22f63ffc2bc6bd5dbb5_descomplica.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/628307c2d00556f6126ace8f/63ee8a52989cb085f798a723_picpay.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/628307c2d00556f6126ace8f/63eab22f98ed4a586ed000ef_ycombinator.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/628307c2d00556f6126ace8f/645273ff0b8caa816ae83853_softbank.png)
## Real Impact, Tangible Results
![FourSquare company logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/628307c2d00556f6126ace8f/6758b19a4e25e31acdfecc77_header-logo-foursquare.svg)
"The main use case we hired Abstra for has been a **huge success.** We've transformed a workload that used to take a team of **5 people 2 weeks** to complete into a task that takes **a single person only 2 days.** "
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/628307c2d00556f6126ace8f/678a79437e25ab604cea5ef5_2.png)
Charles L. - Finance Director & Data Lead 
#### üìà Key results
**‚Ä¢** 510+ hours saved per month**‚Ä¢** 95% reduction in errors**‚Ä¢** Real-time insights for the financial and sales team
![JusBrasil-logo-customer-story-abstra-finance-automation](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/628307c2d00556f6126ace8f/664cf0da9ceda49d882633a6_33e4f4c7-5c39-48cb-bdf1-fe12105976a8.webp)
"Abstra has significantly streamlined our team's manual tasks, **automating various workflows** that previously required hands-on effort.It **saves us valuable time** , minimizes the risk of human error and **enables us to deploy new features** and updates more rapidly, delivering better service to our team."
![Nasse-Image-FP&A- Customer Story - abstra workflow ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/628307c2d00556f6126ace8f/6669b2b5710f8a7e3d6e6492_nasser.webp)
Mario Nasser - Head of FP&A
#### üìà Key results
**‚Ä¢** 220% ROI in the first month**‚Ä¢** Avoided additional hires**‚Ä¢** Real-time insights into processes and agile decision-making
![click-bus-logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/628307c2d00556f6126ace8f/65c0e8b47baead22b883bd11_clickbus.svg)
"We migrated all error-prone, manual processes to Abstra, reducing our operational demands **from 20 hours a week to zero**.Everything is **now automated.** "
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/628307c2d00556f6126ace8f/678a7941797116494dbe9cf9_1.png)
Raphael Frasson - Product Operations
#### üìà Key results
**‚Ä¢** 34x increase in ticket processed‚Ä¢ 83% reduction in partner lead time‚Ä¢ 91% reduction in engineering costs
[Read More Success Stories](https://abstra.io/</customer-stories>)
## Deploy & Host
Share your fully-hosted workflows and UIs with the world in a click
![icon - cloud - hosting](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/628307c2d00556f6126ace8f/64b82c3f0356705721fd71e0_check_cloud_icon.svg)
1-click deploy to a production-ready URL.
![icon - cloud - hosting](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/628307c2d00556f6126ace8f/64b82c3f0356705721fd71e0_check_cloud_icon.svg)
Transparent and scalable hosting.
![icon - cloud - hosting](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/628307c2d00556f6126ace8f/64b82c3f0356705721fd71e0_check_cloud_icon.svg)
Back-end driven architecture**.**
![icon - cloud - hosting](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/628307c2d00556f6126ace8f/64b82c3f0356705721fd71e0_check_cloud_icon.svg)
Integrate with Git.
![](https://abstracloud-webflow-assets.s3.amazonaws.com/3688cloud-features.png)
#### Access control
Securely authenticate users with SSO or SAML providers and manage permissionsto any app with advanced, custom granular control.
#### Auditable, compliant logging
Access and export auditable logsto track events changes to code for compliance investigations.
#### On-prem hosting
Deploy on-premise to benefit from our fast building tools while ensuring every piece of data stays within your network.
## Connect to any data source, service or system
Our Connectors make integration with databases, internal APIs or external services easy. Count on our team for custom add-ons to suit any of your processes.
![Abstra's integrations tools](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/628307c2d00556f6126ace8f/645acbbab6c8985f4a028cb4_04.integration-conectors%20\(1\).webp)
## Easily integrate with Tables, our native database
Create and manage PostgreSQL tables visually with our own relational database. Store and query data directly from inside your projects for easy and safe integration, all in one place.
![abstra's tables - data base](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/628307c2d00556f6126ace8f/651dcc28b2ef5504144f0571_tables_asset.webp)
## Get started
[Book a demo](https://abstra.io/<https:/meet.abstra.app/demo?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.abstra.io%2F&session=undefined>)
# How it works
![vs-code-logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/628307c2d00556f6126ace8f/63e6b56525f5aad20e983d07_vscode.webp)
VS Code Extension
[Drag-and-drop componentsCreate functionality with drag-and-drop widgets. Select from our robust library of sleek designs.](https://abstra.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Bind to Python codeUse variables and functions to bind widgets to a Python script - coded right into VS Code.](https://abstra.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Add your brandEasily add your own logo, background, font and colors to your app for stunning UIs.](https://abstra.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[Deploy to the CloudHit "Share" to generate your web app hosted in a custom subdomain. Connect multiple apps and navigate between tools.](https://abstra.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)
![Postgres table managed with Python](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/628307c2d00556f6126ace8f/643dc270a7f4f22df22a73c6_brand%20dashes.webp)
![Postgres table managed with Python](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/628307c2d00556f6126ace8f/6440069521473956777a6d47_deploy%20dashes.webp)
[Schedule a demo](https://abstra.io/<https:/forms.abstra.run/schedule-demo>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/628307c2d00556f6126ace8f/645e8768a79cdfce361d087e_abstra_logo.svg)](https://abstra.io/<#>)

[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/628307c2d00556f6126ace8f/6285673a96afa4a60955c383_icons8-linkedin-2-60.webp)](https://abstra.io/<https:/www.linkedin.com/company/abstra-tech/>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/628307c2d00556f6126ace8f/628da0055e30ff3a952792f3_icons8-reproduzir-youtube-50.webp)](https://abstra.io/<https:/www.youtube.com/@abstra_io>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/628307c2d00556f6126ace8f/64b81ee73c3870fe6b4e306c_github.webp)](https://abstra.io/<https:/github.com/abstra-app/abstra-lib?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.abstra.io%2F&session=undefined>)

generated_description:
### Abstra: Simplifying Business Process Management with Python

**Overview**  
Founded in 2020 and hailing from the vibrant tech scene in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, Abstra is a Y Combinator S21 graduate focused on streamlining business processes using Python. The company offers a Python-based Business Process Management (BPM) solution that enables companies to elevate their workflows without the usual engineering overhead. Their service stands out with features that ensure everything is auditable and, importantly, lock-in free.

**Mission**  
Abstra is on a mission to empower businesses to scale their operations seamlessly through orchestrated scripts, integrations, and user interfaces. They aim to eliminate the cumbersome engineering hours typically needed for these processes, providing a more efficient and transparent approach to BPM.

**Team and Structure**  
With a compact team of 10 dedicated employees, Abstra positions itself as a nimble player in the expansive SaaS market. They operate under the umbrella of Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Developer Tools, focusing on B2B automation solutions that make business processes smarter.

**Key Solutions**  
Abstra offers various solutions designed to address specific business needs, such as:

- **Credit Analysis**
- **Finance Management**
- **Account Onboarding**
- **Revenue Operations**
- **Human-in-the-loop Integration**

Each solution leverages the power of Python and AI, ensuring optimal workflow management and significant reductions in manual efforts.

**Customer Success**  
Abstra's impact is tangible, with clients across diverse industries reporting substantial productivity gains. For instance:
- One client transformed a task that previously took five people two weeks into a process that takes just one person two days, saving over **510 hours a month**.
- Another reported a **220% ROI** within the first month, alongside avoiding additional hires.
- A third client shifted from **20 hours of manual work per week to zero** through automation.
  
Such results showcase Abstra‚Äôs capabilities in not just delivering software but transforming operational efficiency for its clients.

**Deployment and Integration**  
Abstra emphasizes a user-friendly integration experience. Users can deploy their solutions with a simple click, integrating various data sources and services seamlessly into their workflows. With features that support Git integration and allow for custom built-in tables via PostgreSQL, it offers flexibility and control over operations.

**Get Involved**  
For those interested in experiencing this next-gen BPM solution, Abstra provides numerous resources: documentation, templates, tutorials, and connectors, all geared towards helping potential customers get started swiftly.

**Conclusion**  
In summary, Abstra is addressing a critical gap in business process management by packaging the robustness of Python and AI into a deceptively simple product. Their approach is not just about technology; it's about real-world results and transforming how businesses operate, making them a company to watch in the evolving BPM landscape. For more information, check out their [website](https://abstra.io).
